content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
- Iron Chest at position (x=-16.5, y=-48.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5)
- Iron Chest at position (x=-15.5, y=-48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0)
- Iron Chest at position (x=-13.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0)
- Iron Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (x=42.5, y=-80.5)
- Additional Iron Chests at positions (x=44.5, y=-80.5), (x=45.5, y=-80.5), (x=47.5, y=-80.5), (x=49.5, y=-80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=41.5, y=-78.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Clearing Iron Ore Mining Drill Output
- Ensure that the mining drill output is not blocked and that there is space in the connected storage to receive the mined resources.

### Errors When Supplying Iron Ore to Furnaces
- Verify that you have iron ore in your inventory before attempting to supply it to furnaces.

### Errors When Placing Iron Ore Storage
- Check that the target location is clear of existing objects before attempting to place a new storage entity.

### Errors When Redistributing Iron Ore
- Confirm that there is iron ore available in the source inventory before attempting to redistribute it.

### Errors When Refueling Entities
- Ensure that you have sufficient fuel in your inventory before attempting to refuel mining drills or furnaces.
